description: NoteÂ If you previously used the Update/PhoneUpdateRestrictions policy in previous versions of Windows, it has been deprecated. Please use this policy instead. Allows the IT admin to restrict the updates that are installed on a device to only those on an update approval list. It enables IT to accept the End User License Agreement (EULA) associated with the approved update on behalf of the end-user. EULAs are approved once an update is approved. Supported operations are Get and Replace.
name: RequireUpdateApproval

options.description: Not configured. The device installs all applicable updates.
options.name: Not configured. The device installs all applicable updates.
options.displayName: Not configured. The device installs all applicable updates.

options.description: The device only installs updates that are both applicable and on the Approved Updates list. Set this policy to 1 if IT wants to control the deployment of updates on devices, such as when testing is required prior to deployment.
options.name: The device only installs updates that are both applicable and on the Approved Updates list. Set this policy to 1 if IT wants to control the deployment of updates on devices, such as when testing is required prior to deployment.
